function extractChat() {
  const chatElements = document.querySelectorAll("div.text-base");

  chatElements.forEach((el) => {
    const text = el.innerText.trim();
    if (!text) return;

    const isUser = el.querySelector(".whitespace-pre-wrap")?.previousElementSibling?.innerText?.includes("You")

    result.push({

      text: text

  });

  return result;
}

function scrollToBottomSmoothly() {
